title: Advanced Image Deterioration Techniques: Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic image processing and deep learning model understanding, with Python programming experience
context.additional_context: Acquisition of advanced computer vision techniques for solving dehazing/defogging problems in real-life and workplace environments

learning_goals: Learners generate attention maps by recognizing diverse rainfall patterns
Learners perform deraining model improvements beyond three levels through hierarchical feature preservation
Learners design models achieving over 90% deraining accuracy across five or more synthetic/real-world datasets
Learners implement deraining networks with 20%+ computational efficiency improvement over baseline models using lightweight separable convolutions

resources: Three or More Publicly Available Non-Copyrighted Datasets

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
